p: Modern research around the world needs to now focus on the pharmacological activities of the constituent compounds of these plants and mapping their genomes and transcriptomes to produce target drugs. These compounds include alkaloids, anthraquinones, coumarins, polyphenols (flavonoids, tannins and rosmarinic acid), phenolic acids, lignans, naphthoquinones, peptides, polysaccharides and terpenes.
